com.here.sdk.mapviewlite

Class CameraUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.sdk.mapviewlite.CameraUpdate

  • public final class CameraUpdate
extends java.lang.Object

    Encapsulates raw data for camera parameters. The parameters will not be validated when creating the camera update object. Instead, they will be checked when calling Camera.updateCamera(com.here.sdk.mapviewlite.CameraUpdate).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double bearing
      Bearing, specified as angle in degrees from north, clockwise.
      GeoCoordinates target
      Target point coordinates.
      double tilt
      Tilt angle, in degrees from nadir (0 is top-down view).
      double zoomLevel
      Zoom level.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CameraUpdate(double tilt, double bearing, double zoomLevel, GeoCoordinates target)
